assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all subjects, and study procedures were compliant with the revised Helsinki Declaration of 2000. The study, part of a research project about genetic disorders, was approved by the San Camillo Forlanini Hospital Ethics Board.
